verses.verse: There is therefore <WG686> now <WG3568> no <WG3762> condemnation <WG2631> to them which are in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>, who walk <WG4043> not <WG3361> after <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>, but <WG235> after <WG2596> the Spirit <WG4151>.

For <WG1063> the law <WG3551> of the Spirit <WG4151> of life <WG2222> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> hath made <WG1659> me <WG3165> free <WG1659> from <WG575> the law <WG3551> of sin <WG266> and <WG2532> death <WG2288>.

For <WG1063> what the law <WG3551> could not do <WG102>, in <WG1722> that <WG3739> it was weak <WG770> through <WG1223> the flesh <WG4561>, God <WG2316> sending <WG3992> his own <WG1438> Son <WG5207> in <WG1722> the likeness <WG3667> of sinful <WG266> flesh <WG4561>, and <WG2532> for <WG4012> sin <WG266>, condemned <WG2632> sin <WG266> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>:

That <WG2443> the righteousness <WG1345> of the law <WG3551> might be fulfilled <WG4137> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>, who walk <WG4043> not <WG3361> after <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>, but <WG235> after <WG2596> the Spirit <WG4151>.

For <WG1063> they that are <WG5607> after <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561> do mind <WG5426> the things <WG3588> of the flesh <WG4561>; but <WG1161> they that are after <WG2596> the Spirit <WG4151> the things <WG3588> of the Spirit <WG4151>.
For <WG1063> to be <WG5427> carnally <WG4561> minded <WG5427> is death <WG2288>; but <WG1161> to be <WG5427> spiritually <WG4151> minded <WG5427> is life <WG2222> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515>.

Because <WG1360> the carnal <WG4561> mind <WG5427> is enmity <WG2189> against <WG1519> God <WG2316>: for <WG1063> it is <WG5293> not <WG3756> subject <WG5293> to the law <WG3551> of God <WG2316>, neither <WG3761> indeed <WG1063> can be <WG1410>.
So then <WG1161> they that are <WG5607> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> please <WG700> God <WG2316>.

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>, if so be <WG1512> that the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316> dwell <WG3611> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>. Now <WG1161> if any man <WG1536> have <WG2192> not <WG3756> the Spirit <WG4151> of Christ <WG5547>, he <WG3778> is <WG2076> none <WG3756> of his <WG846>.

And <WG1161> if <WG1487> Christ <WG5547> be in <WG1722> you <WG5213>, the body <WG4983> <WG3303> is dead <WG3498> because <WG1223> of sin <WG266>; but <WG1161> the Spirit <WG4151> is life <WG2222> because <WG1223> of righteousness <WG1343>.

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> the Spirit <WG4151> of him that raised up <WG1453> Jesus <WG2424> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> dwell <WG3611> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>, he that raised up <WG1453> Christ <WG5547> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> shall <WG2227> also <WG2532> quicken <WG2227> your <WG5216> mortal <WG2349> bodies <WG4983> by <WG1223> his <WG846> Spirit <WG4151> that dwelleth <WG1774> <WG1774> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>.
Therefore <WG686> <WG3767>, brethren <WG80>, we are <WG2070> debtors <WG3781>, not <WG3756> to the flesh <WG4561>, to live <WG2198> after <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> ye live <WG2198> after <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>, ye shall <WG3195> die <WG599>: but <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye <WG2289> through the Spirit <WG4151> do mortify <WG2289> the deeds <WG4234> of the body <WG4983>, ye shall live <WG2198>.
For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> are led <WG71> by the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316>, they <WG3778> are <WG1526> the sons <WG5207> of God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> ye have <WG2983> not <WG3756> received <WG2983> the spirit <WG4151> of bondage <WG1397> again <WG3825> to <WG1519> fear <WG5401>; but <WG235> ye have received <WG2983> the Spirit <WG4151> of adoption <WG5206>, whereby <WG1722> <WG3739> we cry <WG2896>, Abba <WG5>, Father <WG3962>.
The Spirit <WG4151> itself <WG846> beareth witness <WG4828> with our <WG2257> spirit <WG4151>, that <WG3754> we are <WG2070> the children <WG5043> of God <WG2316>:

And <WG1161> if <WG1487> children <WG5043>, then <WG2532> heirs <WG2818>; heirs <WG2818> of God <WG3303> <WG2316>, and <WG1161> joint-heirs <WG4789> with Christ <WG5547>; if so be <WG1512> that we suffer with <WG4841> him, that <WG2443> we may be <WG4888> also <WG2532> glorified together <WG4888>.

For <WG1063> I reckon <WG3049> that <WG3754> the sufferings <WG3804> of this present <WG3568> time <WG2540> are not <WG3756> worthy <WG514> to be compared with <WG4314> the glory <WG1391> which shall <WG3195> be revealed <WG601> in <WG1519> us <WG2248>.
For <WG1063> the earnest expectation <WG603> of the creature <WG2937> waiteth <WG553> for the manifestation <WG602> of the sons <WG5207> of God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> the creature <WG2937> was made subject <WG5293> to vanity <WG3153>, not <WG3756> willingly <WG1635>, but <WG235> by reason <WG1223> of him who hath subjected <WG5293> the same in <WG1909> hope <WG1680>,

Because <WG3754> the creature <WG2937> itself <WG846> also <WG2532> shall be delivered <WG1659> from <WG575> the bondage <WG1397> of corruption <WG5356> into <WG1519> the glorious <WG1391> liberty <WG1657> of the children <WG5043> of God <WG2316>.
For <WG1063> we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the whole <WG3956> creation <WG2937> groaneth <WG4959> and <WG2532> travaileth in pain together <WG4944> until <WG891> now <WG3568>.

And <WG1161> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> they, but <WG235> ourselves <WG846> also <WG2532>, which have <WG2192> the firstfruits <WG536> of the Spirit <WG4151>, even <WG2532> we <WG2249> ourselves <WG846> groan <WG4727> within <WG1722> ourselves <WG1438>, waiting <WG553> for the adoption <WG5206>, to wit, the redemption <WG629> of our <WG2257> body <WG4983>.

For <WG1063> we are saved <WG4982> by hope <WG1680>: but <WG1161> hope <WG1680> that is seen <WG991> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> hope <WG1680>: for <WG1063> what <WG3739> a man <WG5100> seeth <WG991>, why <WG5101> doth he <WG1679> yet <WG2532> hope for <WG1679>?
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> we hope <WG1679> for that <WG3739> we see <WG991> not <WG3756>, then do we <WG553> with <WG1223> patience <WG5281> wait for <WG553> it.

<WG1161>Likewise <WG5615> the Spirit <WG4151> also <WG2532> helpeth <WG4878> our <WG2257> infirmities <WG769>: for <WG1063> we know <WG1492> not <WG3756> what <WG5101> we should pray for <WG4336> as <WG2526> we ought <WG1163>: but <WG235> the Spirit <WG4151> itself <WG846> maketh intercession <WG5241> for <WG5228> us <WG2257> with groanings <WG4726> which cannot be uttered <WG215>.

And <WG1161> he that searcheth <WG2045> the hearts <WG2588> knoweth <WG1492> what <WG5101> is the mind <WG5427> of the Spirit <WG4151>, because <WG3754> he maketh intercession <WG1793> for <WG5228> the saints <WG40> according <WG2596> to the will of God <WG2316>.

And <WG1161> we know <WG1492> that all things <WG3956> work together <WG4903> for <WG1519> good <WG18> to them that <WG3754> love <WG25> God <WG2316>, to them who are <WG5607> the called <WG2822> according <WG2596> to his purpose <WG4286>.

For <WG3754> whom <WG3739> he did foreknow <WG4267>, he <WG4309> also <WG2532> did predestinate <WG4309> to be conformed <WG4832> to the image <WG1504> of his <WG846> Son <WG5207>, that <WG1519> he <WG846> might be <WG1511> the firstborn <WG4416> among <WG1722> many <WG4183> brethren <WG80>.

Moreover <WG1161> whom <WG3739> he did predestinate <WG4309>, them <WG5128> he <WG2564> also <WG2532> called <WG2564>: and <WG2532> whom <WG3739> he called <WG2564>, them <WG5128> he <WG1344> also <WG2532> justified <WG1344>: and <WG1161> whom <WG3739> he justified <WG1344>, them <WG5128> he <WG1392> also <WG2532> glorified <WG1392>.
What <WG5101> shall we <WG2046> then <WG3767> say <WG2046> to <WG4314> these things <WG5023>? If <WG1487> God <WG2316> be for <WG5228> us <WG2257>, who <WG5101> can be against <WG2596> us <WG2257>?

He that <WG3739> <WG1065> spared <WG5339> not <WG3756> his own <WG2398> Son <WG5207>, but <WG235> delivered <WG3860> him <WG846> up <WG3860> for <WG5228> us <WG2257> all <WG3956>, how <WG4459> shall he <WG5483> not <WG3780> with <WG4862> him <WG846> also <WG2532> freely give <WG5483> us <WG2254> all things <WG3956>?
Who <WG5101> shall lay any thing <WG1458> to the charge <WG2596> of God's <WG2316> elect <WG1588>? It is God <WG2316> that justifieth <WG1344>.

Who <WG5101> is he that condemneth <WG2632>? It is Christ <WG5547> that died <WG599>, yea <WG1161> rather <WG3123> <WG2532>, that is risen again <WG1453>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> even <WG2532> at <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of God <WG2316>, who <WG3739> also <WG2532> maketh intercession <WG1793> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>.

Who <WG5101> shall separate <WG5563> us <WG2248> from <WG575> the love <WG26> of Christ <WG5547>? shall tribulation <WG2347>, or <WG2228> distress <WG4730>, or <WG2228> persecution <WG1375>, or <WG2228> famine <WG3042>, or <WG2228> nakedness <WG1132>, or <WG2228> peril <WG2794>, or <WG2228> sword <WG3162>?

As <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG3754>, For thy <WG4675> sake <WG1752> we are killed <WG2289> all <WG3650> the day long <WG2250>; we are accounted <WG3049> as <WG5613> sheep <WG4263> for the slaughter <WG4967>.
Nay <WG235>, in <WG1722> all <WG3956> these things <WG5125> we are more than conquerors <WG5245> through <WG1223> him that loved <WG25> us <WG2248>.

For <WG1063> I am persuaded <WG3982>, that <WG3754> neither <WG3777> death <WG2288>, nor <WG3777> life <WG2222>, nor <WG3777> angels <WG32>, nor <WG3777> principalities <WG746>, nor <WG3777> powers <WG1411>, nor <WG3777> things present <WG1764>, nor <WG3777> things to come <WG3195>,

Nor <WG3777> height <WG5313>, nor <WG3777> depth <WG899>, nor <WG3777> any <WG5100> other <WG2087> creature <WG2937>, shall be able <WG1410> to separate <WG5563> us <WG2248> from <WG575> the love <WG26> of God <WG2316>, which is in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962>.
